channel.title: green on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in green on ossem: a creative space

item.title: green
item.description: The sun sits bright where she lies telling story and story about her skies. those blue skies ? a soft sadness sad a soft madness mad somehow I see her sometimes traveling foot and hoof wander wander wonder happiness rains more than not when that sad voice rains on them don't be troubled don't be s u d d e n l y s u l l e n ly it all seems clear to the one you knew you wanted to the one you threw away not me of course but you or wait.
